title: Area of Triangle
description: Write a C program to find the area of a triangle.

title: Total and Average Percentage
description: Write a C program to find the total and average percentage obtained by a student for 6 subjects.

title: Digit Separation
description: Read a 3-digit number and output as '1 Hundreds 7 Tens 2 Units' for 172 and print the reverse of the number.

description: Check whether a given character is vowel or not using switch-case.

title: Age Input
description: Write a C program to read age from user and display it.
subject: c_lab_manual

title: Sum of n Numbers
description: Find sum of n numbers using for, while, do-while statements.
subject: c_lab_manual

title: String Functions
description: Perform various string handling functions: strlen, strcpy, strcat, strcmp.

testcases.expected_output:
Length: 5
Copied: hello
Concatenated: helloworld
Comparison: -15

title: Matrix Operations
description: Perform matrix addition, subtraction and multiplication.

title: Search Algorithms
description: Search a given number using linear and binary search.

testcases.expected_output:
Linear Search: Found at index 2

title: Sorting Algorithms
description: Arrange the given set of numbers using bubble sort, selection sort and insertion sort.

testcases.expected_output:
Bubble Sort: 1 2 5 8 9
Selection Sort: 1 2 5 8 9
Insertion Sort: 1 2 5 8 9

subject: c_lab_manual

description: Find the factorial of a given number using function and recursion.

Employee: John
Basic: 10000
